mapper.select: select dgw.monitoring_location_identifier "featureId", #{serverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || 'collections/monitoring-locations' || '/items/' || ml.monitoring_location_identifier || '?f=json' as "monLocReference", site_name "siteName", date_measured_raw "resultDateTimeUTC", /* timestamp of the UTC time */ display_result "resultValue", parm.parm_unt_tx "resultUnit", parameter_code "pcode", parm.parm_ds "pcodeDesc", 'Daily random instantaneous values' "statisticDesc", 'http://waterdata.usgs.gov/nwisweb/rdf?statCd=00011' "statisticReference", result_measure_qualifiers::text "qualifiersAsJson", approval_level_description "status" from nwis.discrete_ground_water_aqts dgw join nwis.monitoring_location ml on ml.monitoring_location_identifier = ml.monitoring_location_identifier left join nwis.parm parm on dgw.parameter_code = parm.parm_cd where dgw.monitoring_location_identifier = #{featureId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by "featureId", "pcode", "statisticDesc", "resultDateTimeUTC"
